forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 22 overnight. South southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers after 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 8pm, then a chance of rain and snow between 8pm and 11pm, then a chance of rain and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 35 overnight. South wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 7am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run was spectacular today with the beautiful blue sky day! Thanks to the wonderful crew who works so hard on making snow and grooming!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be packed this morning. Coverage and grooming are very good.
nubsNob.comments: There was a strong wind last night that is predicted to calm down considerably today. The snow surface is machine groomed and some drifting snow could be encountered. Conditions are still very good as we head toward Christmas. Pintail Peak is open. The Pintail Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. NASTAR racing begins at 12:30 on Birch Run. The soup of the day is beef, mushroom and potatoes. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
